directions: In a blender or food processor, whirl the goat cheese, yogurt, dill, parsley and lemon juice until smooth. Season with the salt and pepper. Transfer the dip to a bowl.
Arrange the radishes, beets, sugar snap peas and carrots on a platter or serving board. Place the bowl of dip on the platter and serve immediately. Makes about 1 cup dip; serves 6.
, by Karen Ansel, MS, RD and Charity Ferreira (Weldon Owen, 2011).
ingredients: 3 small raw golden beets, thinly sliced
2 bunches small carrots, trimmed and peeled
title: Creamy Herb Dip with Crudités
